title: Is We Dumb? | Purse Poop. McDonalds. Parachute. Yep.
description:
Can you imagine if your partner stopped saying "yeahhh" in bed and started saying "yep" instead? That changes everything! Let's talk about that, keeping turds in your purse, buying the wrong sized underwear for your sister, setting your expectations way too high for a fast food joint, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/0wSkYSPcRXg

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
